Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at The Westin Grand Vancouver, you'll be centrally located in Vancouver, steps from Vancouver Central Public Library and minutes from Orpheum Theater. This 4-star hotel is close to Granville Island Public Market and Stanley Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 207 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with microwaves and dishwashers. Your pillowtop bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets. Flat-screen televisions with digital programming are provided for your entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including a health club, an outdoor pool, and a spa tub. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge) and wedding services.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a business center, and express check-in. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Vancouver Central Public Library - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Orpheum Theater - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Vancouver Art Gallery - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi

BC Place Stadium - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Christ Church Cathedral - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Bill Reid Gallery of Northwest Coast Art - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Vancouver International Film Centre - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Rogers Arena - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Plaza of Nations - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Harbour Centre - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Marine Building - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for The Westin Grand Vancouver is Vancouver, BC (YVR-Vancouver Intl.) - 10.4 km / 6.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

RoomType.text: Double Guest room, 1 King, Low floor

Message.Text: Note: **Westin Hotels are now 100% smoke free. There is no smoking in the entire hotel. *Please be advised there is a fee for early departures.
